spec_data.Name: perl-IPC-Signal
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module contains utility functions for dealing with signals.
Currently these are just translating between signal names and signal
numbers and vice versa.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:30:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Utility functions dealing with signals for Perl
